enemy_1322_wdgyht.description: 'Forever honor one's commitments,' the proud motto of House Caster. While the Duke's military and political might are more than enough to back their word, the 'Trilby Ashers' are the real reason why the Duke of Caster's words hold any weight.

abilityList.text: After several attacks, moves towards the next checkpoint for the next attack

enemy_1322_wdgyht_2.name: 'Shadowing Trilby Asher'
enemy_1322_wdgyht_2.description: To the Duke of Caster, a 'Trilby Asher' is more of a consumable than a collectible. On the day a 'Trilby Asher' is honored with the job, another 'Shadowing Trilby Asher' is also born—only succeeding their predecessor when their mentor dies.

abilityList.text: After several attacks, moves towards the next checkpoint for the next attack

enemy_1323_wdbshd.name: Deconstructed Distortion
enemy_1323_wdbshd.description: The Damazti Cluster has spent their long life trying to study themselves. This intelligent and audacious long-lived has tried to surmount the limitations of the flesh and bestow life to inanimate objects, but 'immortality' remains a difficult premise to prove.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.
Attacks inflict <$ba.dt.erosion>Corrosion Damage</>; loses HP every second

enemy_1325_cbgpro.name: Military Hound
enemy_1325_cbgpro.description: Military hounds that first saw action in Bolívar. Their claws and fangs are as vicious as their temperament.

enemy_1325_cbgpro_2.name: Elite Military Hound
enemy_1325_cbgpro_2.description: Carefully picked military hounds that chase their quarry to the bitter end.

enemy_1326_cbagen.name: Trimounts City Defender
enemy_1326_cbagen.description: Columbian soldiers stationed in Trimounts. They have close ties to all the tech companies and first dibs on cutting-edge equipment.

abilityList.text: Attacks temporarily inflict -1 Block to allied Operators
If Operator is on a Gravity Switch, reduces their Block to 0

enemy_1326_cbagen_2.name: Trimounts City Defender Captain
enemy_1326_cbagen_2.description: Columbian soldiers stationed in Trimounts. They have a good understanding of all the tech companies and will choose to fight with their favorite corporation's equipment.

abilityList.text: Attacks temporarily inflict -1 Block to allied Operators
If Operator is on a Gravity Switch, reduces their Block to 0

enemy_1327_cbrokt.name: Arc Commando
enemy_1327_cbrokt.description: Soldiers from the experimental unit born of the 'Horizon Arc Project,' able to fly at low altitudes with their jet propulsion equipment.

abilityList.text: If Movement Speed is higher than starting speed, gains <$ba.float>Low-Altitude Hovering</> and takes off!

enemy_1327_cbrokt_2.name: Arc Commando Captain
enemy_1327_cbrokt_2.description: Soldiers from the experimental unit born of the 'Horizon Arc Project,' skilled at flying with their jet propulsion equipment. They enjoy the feeling of defying gravity.

abilityList.text: If Movement Speed is higher than starting speed, gains <$ba.float>Low-Altitude Hovering</> and takes off!

enemy_1328_cbjedi.name: Arc Frontliner
enemy_1328_cbjedi.description: Deadly soldiers from an experimental unit outfitted with cutting-edge equipment. However, the instability of their gear is their weak spot.

abilityList.text: Loses HP proportional to distance moved when shifted

enemy_1328_cbjedi_2.name: Arc Frontliner Leader
enemy_1328_cbjedi_2.description: Deadly soldiers from an experimental unit outfitted with highly lethal cutting-edge equipment. A formidable foe even when their gear's weaknesses have been revealed.

abilityList.text: Loses HP proportional to distance moved when shifted

enemy_1329_cbshld.name: Arc Screenguard
enemy_1329_cbshld.description: Soldiers from an experimental unit with formidable defenses using the most advanced alloy technologies. However, the unresolved instability of the material makes them better suited for short, high-pressure skirmishes than drawn-out battles.

abilityList.text: Starting DEF and RES are high, but reduced whenever damage is taken

enemy_1329_cbshld_2.name: Arc Screenguard Captain
enemy_1329_cbshld_2.description: Soldiers from an experimental unit with formidable defenses using the most advanced alloy technologies. They don't even need their equipment to hold the frontline and prevent the enemy's advance.

abilityList.text: Starting DEF and RES are high, but reduced whenever damage is taken

enemy_1330_cbrush.name: 'Offender' Production Model
enemy_1330_cbrush.description: Unmanned attack vehicles primarily developed by Volvort Kochinski. Equipped with advanced power units, they assault the enemy with their solid defenses and high speed.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by Operators with 3 or more Block
When passing by an Operator, deals physical damage to them based on Movement Speed

enemy_1330_cbrush_2.name: 'Offender' Prototype
enemy_1330_cbrush_2.description: Unmanned attack vehicles primarily developed by Volvort Kochinski. Equipped with advanced power units, they fiercely assault the enemy with their solid defenses and high speed.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by Operators with 3 or more Block
When passing by an Operator, deals physical damage to them based on Movement Speed

enemy_1331_cbsisy.name: 'Crossroads' Production Model
enemy_1331_cbsisy.description: Unmanned defense vehicles primarily developed by Volvort Kochinski. They emit mid-length lasers in all four directions, providing excellent defense in narrow corridors, and significantly hindering the enemy even in open terrain.

abilityList.text: Attacks in 4 directions while moving, dealing Arts damage and deals increased damage to nearby targets
Continuously tries to push nearby <Planetary Debris>

enemy_1331_cbsisy_2.name: 'Crossroads' Prototype
enemy_1331_cbsisy_2.description: Unmanned defense vehicles primarily developed by Volvort Kochinski. They emit intense mid-length lasers in all four directions, providing first-class defense in narrow corridors, and dramatically hindering the enemy even in open terrain.

abilityList.text: Attacks in 4 directions while moving, dealing Arts damage and deals increased damage to nearby targets
Continuously tries to push nearby <Planetary Debris>

enemy_1332_cbterm.name: 'Traffic Tower' Production Model
enemy_1332_cbterm.description: A robot primarily developed by Volvort Kochinski, the crystallization of cutting-edge advances in every field. Volvort Kochinski wanted to use this design to win back the DOD's favor, but it was overshadowed by the Galleria Stellaria.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 4 Block
DEF and RES is reduced whenever damage is taken
When destroyed, ejects a <'Traffic Officer'> and self-destructs, dealing physical damage to nearby units

enemy_1332_cbterm_2.name: 'Traffic Tower' Prototype
enemy_1332_cbterm_2.description: A robot primarily developed by Volvort Kochinski, the crystallization of cutting-edge advances in every field. If they could lower the cost of production to make it feasible for mass-production, perhaps it could even change the nature of warfare.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 4 Block
DEF and RES is reduced whenever damage is taken
When destroyed, ejects a <'Traffic Officer Captain'> and self-destructs, dealing physical damage to nearby units

enemy_1333_cbbgen.name: 'Traffic Officer'
enemy_1333_cbbgen.description: Pilot of a 'Traffic Tower,' the cream of the crop from the military's strict selection process. Has impressive combat abilities even after leaving their robot.

abilityList.text: Starts temporarily <$ba.invisible>invisible</> and accelerates
Attacks temporarily inflict -1 Block to allied Operators
If Operator is on a Gravity Switch, reduces their Block to 0

enemy_1333_cbbgen_2.name: 'Traffic Officer Captain'
enemy_1333_cbbgen_2.description: Pilot of a 'Traffic Tower,' the cream of the crop from the military's strict selection process. Has formidable combat abilities even after leaving their robot. They are even trained to detonate their vehicle in emergencies and continue the fight on foot.

abilityList.text: Starts temporarily <$ba.invisible>invisible</> and accelerates
Attacks temporarily inflict -1 Block to allied Operators
If Operator is on a Gravity Switch, reduces their Block to 0

enemy_1335_bldrat.name: Gnawbeast
enemy_1335_bldrat.description: An Infected Creature that appears in dark places. It has a high reproductive capacity, and can be commonly found everywhere. The endless usage of its host's food stocks makes it an unwelcome houseguest.

abilityList.text: Inflicts Bleed on allied Operators after several attacks

enemy_1335_bldrat_2.name: Starving Gnawbeast
enemy_1335_bldrat_2.description: An Infected Creature that appears in dark places. It has a high reproductive capacity, and is commonly found everywhere. It's currently starving! Be careful, hungry creatures tend to be more violent!

abilityList.text: Inflicts Bleed on allied Operators after several attacks

enemy_1336_bldbat.name: Vesperwing
enemy_1336_bldbat.description: An Infected Creature that appears in dark places, often found in deep caves and abandoned buildings. It is easily startled, and will not hesitate to attack intruders who enter its territory.

abilityList.text: Aerial unit, prioritizes attacking Holy Statue
Deals Arts damage
Inflicts Bleed on allied Operators after several attacks

enemy_1336_bldbat_2.name: Startled Vesperwing
enemy_1336_bldbat_2.description: A startled Vesperwing will attack intruders who enter its territory at any cost. Their claws and fangs are sharp, and they are both ferocious and impatient. But in their eyes, they're simply protecting their homeland.

abilityList.text: Aerial unit, prioritizes attacking Holy Statue
Deals Arts damage
Inflicts Bleed on allied Operators after several attacks

enemy_1337_bhrknf.name: Wasteland Robber
enemy_1337_bhrknf.description: A member of a bandit gang operating in the wastelands using stolen weapons. They are not soldiers, and lack professional training, so stealing goods is more important to them than anything else.

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
Prioritizes attacking Holy Statue
Steals 1 DP from allied Operators after several attacks

enemy_1337_bhrknf_2.name: Elite Wasteland Robber
enemy_1337_bhrknf_2.description: An elite member of a bandit gang operating in the wastelands using stolen weapons. Now leading a small group of subordinates, they have kept their plundering habits and are even greedier than their henchmen.

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
Prioritizes attacking Holy Statue
Steals 1 DP from allied Operators after several attacks

enemy_1338_bhrjst.name: Wasteland Skulker
enemy_1338_bhrjst.description: A member of a bandit gang operating in the wastelands, sneakily operating in the shadows. They habitually speak in half-truths, and many of them used to moonlight as pickpockets before they drifted into the wastes.

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
<$ba.invisible>Invisible</>
When on the field, natural DP regeneration rate is reduced

enemy_1338_bhrjst_2.name: Elite Wasteland Skulker
enemy_1338_bhrjst_2.description: An elite member of a bandit gang operating in the wastelands, sneakily operating in the shadows. Some claim to have complicated pasts, but the truth of it is irrelevant: their skillsets are now used only for survival.

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
<$ba.invisible>Invisible</>
When on the field, natural DP regeneration rate is reduced

enemy_1339_bhrgrd.name: Wasteland Plunderer
enemy_1339_bhrgrd.description: A member of a bandit gang operating in the wastelands, equipped with the best gear the bandits can get their hands on. When life became unsustainable, some gave in to their desperation, becoming ferocious outlaws roaming the wastes.

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
After several attacks, steals 3 DP and recovers a certain amount of HP

enemy_1339_bhrgrd_2.name: Elite Wasteland Plunderer
enemy_1339_bhrgrd_2.description: An elite member of a bandit gang operating in the wastelands, equipped with the best gear the bandits can get their hands on. The most vicious plunderers are completely indifferent to the suffering of others, having long forgotten that they were once just the most desperate of civilians.

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
After several attacks, steals 3 DP and recovers a certain amount of HP

enemy_1340_bthtbw.name: Bounty Hunter Crossbowman
enemy_1340_bthtbw.description: A bounty hunter adept at attacking from long-range. A little skilled, but nothing more. Moonlights as a bandit when there is no bounty to hunt.

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
Prioritizes attacking Holy Statue
After several attacks, the next attack deals splash damage to a cross area surrounding the target and steals DP equivalent to the number of targets hit

enemy_1340_bthtbw_2.name: Bounty Hunter Crossbowman Captain
enemy_1340_bthtbw_2.description: A bounty hunter adept at attacking from long-range. A little skilled, with some notoriety. New bounties don't show up every day, so why not earn some extra money in their free time?

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
Prioritizes attacking Holy Statue
After several attacks, the next attack deals splash damage to a cross area surrounding the target and steals DP equivalent to the number of targets hit

enemy_1341_bthtms.name: Bounty Hunter Disruptor
enemy_1341_bthtms.description: A bounty hunter who uses melee weapons and knows a little Originium Arts, pressuring their enemies with their ferocious appearance. Moonlights as a bandit when there is no bounty to hunt.

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
Deals Arts damage
Every Disruptor on the field will reduce Max DP by a certain amount

enemy_1341_bthtms_2.name: Bounty Hunter Disruptor Captain
enemy_1341_bthtms_2.description: A bounty hunter who uses melee weapons and Originium Arts to intimidate others. New bounties don't show up every day, so why not earn some extra money in their free time?

abilityList.text: Can appear in the battlefield
Deals Arts damage
Every Disruptor Captain on the field will reduce Max DP by a certain amount

enemy_1342_frtuna.name: Fortuna, Fallen Angel
enemy_1342_frtuna.description: A fallen Sankta girl, the innocent and ignorant Fortuna. With her dimmed halo and black horns, paradise has closed its doors on her. What has actually changed, and what has not?

abilityList.text: While this unit is holding Ammo, attacks become long-ranged and deal a large amount of Physical damage. Ammo capacity: 6
Has a chance to miss ranged attacks

enemy_3005_lpeopl.name: Monastery Inhabitant
enemy_3005_lpeopl.description: A civilian sheltering in the monastery, treating the place as home. Simple and feeble, yet they strive to live. Yearning for spiritual sustenance, they pursue their faith, but are easily provoked into rushing around blindly.

abilityList.text: Stays on the field and does not move towards the Objective Point
Panic level continuously increases in battle
Becomes Terrified when Panic level is full, and will continuously lose HP
Will deplete a Life Point upon dying; Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter

enemy_3005_lpeopl_2.name: Monastery Inhabitant
enemy_3005_lpeopl_2.description: A civilian sheltering in the monastery, treating the place as home. Simple and feeble, yet they strive to live. Yearning for spiritual sustenance, they pursue their faith, but are easily provoked into rushing around blindly.

abilityList.text: Stays on the field and does not move towards the Objective Point
Panic level continuously increases in battle
Becomes Terrified when Panic level is full, and will continuously lose HP
Will deplete a Life Point upon dying; Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter

enemy_1344_ddlamb.name: Hot Spring 'Mischievous Rascal'
enemy_1344_ddlamb.description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice on the street, and wants to play with whoever it bumps into. Even though you can't make out its expression from its obscured face, you can sense it in its revelry.

abilityList.text: Leaves Carmine Steam at its location when defeated

enemy_1344_ddlamb_2.name: Hot Spring 'Jolly Rascal'
enemy_1344_ddlamb_2.description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice on the street, and wants to play with whoever it bumps into. Even though you can't make out its expression from its obscured face, you can tell it's relishing in its delight—listen! It's laughing!

abilityList.text: Leaves Carmine Steam at its location when defeated

enemy_1345_tplamb.name: Fashion Street 'Hearty Heavy'
enemy_1345_tplamb.description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice from the sports field. It'll be really happy if you throw its 'treasure' back at it. Thankfully, it only throws frisbees, and not discuses.

abilityList.text: Leaves Carmine Steam at its location when defeated

enemy_1345_tplamb_2.name: Fashion Street 'Robust Heavy'
enemy_1345_tplamb_2.description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice from the sports field. It'll be really happy if you throw its 'treasure' back at it. Wait, no! It seem to be holding discuses this time!

abilityList.text: Leaves Carmine Steam at its location when defeated

enemy_1346_ynshp.name: Hot Spring 'Wandering Vagrant'
enemy_1346_ynshp.description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice from the surfskate shop, so fast that it comes and goes without a trace! It's practicing its acceleration and turning for the upcoming 'Lava Surfing Championships.'

abilityList.text: <$ba.invisible>Invisible</>
Can stack with a Hot Spring 'Mischievous Rascal' and leaves Carmine Steam on tiles it travels over after combining

enemy_1346_ynshp_2.name: Hot Spring 'Wandering Slider'
enemy_1346_ynshp_2.description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice from the surfskate shop, so fast that it comes and goes without a trace! Not even the swirling mud or gravel can hinder its slick skating skills!

abilityList.text: <$ba.invisible>Invisible</>
Can stack with a Hot Spring 'Jolly Rascal' and leaves Carmine Steam on tiles it travels over after combining

enemy_1347_fyshp.name: Fashion Street 'Ordinary Aviator'
enemy_1347_fyshp.description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice from the aviation shop. It can fly, but it's not very good at it. Sometimes it can float up real high, but don't mistake it for a pink cloud!

abilityList.text: <$ba.float>Low-Altitude Hovering</>
Can stack with a Fashion Street 'Hearty Heavy' and is capable of long-range attacks after combining

enemy_1347_fyshp_2.name: Fashion Street 'Hyperactive Aviator'
enemy_1347_fyshp_2.description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice from the aviation shop. It can fly, but it's not very good at it. However, it's learned to float around in a group, filling the sky with soft clouds and interrupting the people's leisurely sunbathing.

abilityList.text: <$ba.float>Low-Altitude Hovering</>
Can stack with a Fashion Street 'Robust Heavy' and is capable of long-range attacks after combining

enemy_1348_rllamb.name: Urban 'Whirlwind Walker'
enemy_1348_rllamb.description: A mass of fluffy critters fighting over cotton candy, and it's a little hard to tell where the fur ends and where the candyfloss begins. The main reason the Candy House grandpa is so angry is because they snatched his wig off too!

abilityList.text: Explodes on first attack, dealing AoE Arts damage and spawning Carmine Steam
Summons a Hot Spring 'Mischievous Rascal' and Fashion Street 'Hearty Heavy' upon dying

enemy_1348_rllamb_2.name: Urban 'Tornado Trendsetter'
enemy_1348_rllamb_2.description: A mass of fluffy critters fighting over cotton candy, and it's a little hard to tell where the fur ends and where the candyfloss begins. Instead of candyfloss they've only had a mouthful of sand, so now they're itching for a bite.

abilityList.text: Explodes on first attack, dealing AoE Arts damage and spawning Carmine Steam
Summons a Hot Spring 'Jolly Rascal' and Fashion Street 'Robust Heavy' upon dying

enemy_1349_rckshp.name: 'Big Fella'
enemy_1349_rckshp.description: A humongous and somewhat slow-moving fluffy critter, its sturdiness possibly stems from never picking at its food. Sometimes it will spit out a few 'Little Fellas'—they might have been eaten by accident earlier.

abilityList.text: Throws a Hot Spring 'Mischievous Rascal' on first attack

enemy_1349_rckshp_2.name: 'Big Man'
enemy_1349_rckshp_2.description: A humongous and somewhat slow-moving fluffy critter, its sturdiness possibly stems from never picking at its food. Some 'Little Fellas' will willingly be eaten, for this lets them ponder their thoughts—just what exactly is the difference between them and the volcano?

abilityList.text: Throws a Hot Spring 'Jolly Rascal' on first attack

enemy_1350_mgcshp.name: Fashion Street 'Stellar Caster'
enemy_1350_mgcshp.description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice from a mysterious divination shop that will make anyone who notices it 'see stars'! It's very clever, and knows that the next most important thing after a wand is the magic hat on its head!

abilityList.text: Attacks 3 units simultaneously when in contact with Carmine Steam

enemy_1350_mgcshp_2.name: Fashion Street 'Supernova Caster'
enemy_1350_mgcshp_2.description: A fluffy critter that has found something nice from a mysterious divination shop that will make people who notice it 'see stars'! It has become even stronger due to the latest limited-edition magic hat on its head.

abilityList.text: Attacks 3 units simultaneously when in contact with Carmine Steam

enemy_1351_yhhshp.name: 'Fluffy Buddy'
enemy_1351_yhhshp.description: If these gentle and difficult-to-perceive fluffy critters suddenly appear in front of you, don't be frightened! In the hot springs, atop the white clouds, and in your memories... Will you still think of them years down the line?

abilityList.text: Hidden in map, can be revealed by Carmine Steam or Pure White Steam
When in contact with Carmine Steam, its explosion produces more Carmine Steam on surrounding tiles and dealing Arts damage to nearby allied units
When in contact with Pure White Steam, its explosion produces more Pure White Steam on surrounding tiles and healing surrounding allied units

enemy_1352_eslime.name: Radioactive Originium Slug
enemy_1352_eslime.description: A wild Infected creature that accidentally consumed too much industrial waste, causing it to leak Arts energy upon death. These low-intelligence creatures are easily manipulated by enemy casters to launch swarming attacks on manmade facilities.

abilityList.text: When defeated, deals heavy Arts damage in an area and causes all enemies on the field to gain 1 Energy.

enemy_1352_eslime_2.name: Radioactive Originium Slug α
enemy_1352_eslime_2.description: A wild Infected creature that accidentally consumed too much industrial waste, causing it to leak Arts energy upon death. More dangerous than ordinary radioactive Originium slugs, these low-intelligence creatures are easily manipulated by enemy casters to launch swarming attacks on manmade facilities.

abilityList.text: When defeated, deals heavy Arts damage in an area and causes all enemies on the field to gain 1 Energy.

enemy_1353_esabr.name: Paramilitary Gangster
enemy_1353_esabr.description: A gangster hired to sow chaos, often picking fights. Their employer has provided them with an experimental thermal amplification device.

abilityList.text: Energy Capacity: 10; Gains [Overload] upon reaching max Energy.
[Overload] Greatly increases ASPD, DEF, and RES for a period of time.

enemy_1353_esabr_2.name: Paramilitary Gangster Leader
enemy_1353_esabr_2.description: A gangster hired to sow chaos, well-accustomed to brawls. Their employer has provided them with an experimental thermal amplification device.

abilityList.text: Energy Capacity: 10; Gains [Overload] upon reaching max Energy.
[Overload] Greatly increases ASPD, DEF, and RES for a period of time.

enemy_1354_eghost.name: Paramilitary Thief
enemy_1354_eghost.description: A gangster hired to sow chaos, more interested in stealing property than injuring others. The thermal amplification devices they are equipped with have not actually been tested for safety.

abilityList.text: Can't be blocked. Energy Capacity: 10; Gains [Overload] upon reaching max Energy.
[Overload] Greatly increases ASPD, DEF, and RES for a period of time.

enemy_1354_eghost_2.name: Paramilitary Thief Leader
enemy_1354_eghost_2.description: A gangster hired to sow chaos, adept at evading capture and acting quickly. The thermal amplification devices they are equipped with have not actually been tested for safety.

abilityList.text: Can't be blocked. Energy Capacity: 10; Gains [Overload] upon reaching max Energy.
[Overload] Greatly increases ASPD, DEF, and RES for a period of time.

enemy_1355_mrfly.name: Blocker
enemy_1355_mrfly.description: An unmanned drone controlled by enemy forces, capable of interfering with Originium Arts. They mostly play a supportive role and lack direct offensive capabilities.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.
Increases the RES of surrounding enemy units.

enemy_1355_mrfly_2.name: Blocker–P
enemy_1355_mrfly_2.description: An unmanned drone controlled by enemy forces, capable of interfering with Originium Arts. More effective than regular models, they mostly play a supportive role and lack direct offensive capabilities.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.
Increases the RES of surrounding enemy units.

enemy_1356_egun.name: Paramilitary Sniper
enemy_1356_egun.description: An outlaw hired to sow chaos, equipped with a thermal energy blaster with its output cranked up too high. However, as a result of this, they are able to charge the equipment of other gangsters.

abilityList.text: Energy Capacity: 20; Gains [Overload] upon reaching max Energy.
Periodically stops moving and continuously provides Energy to all enemies within attack range.
[Overload] Greatly increases ASPD, DEF, and RES for a longer period of time.

enemy_1356_egun_2.name: Paramilitary Sniper Leader
enemy_1356_egun_2.description: An outlaw hired to sow chaos, well-accustomed to using thermal energy blasters and eager to just start blasting.

abilityList.text: Energy Capacity: 20; Gains [Overload] upon reaching max Energy.
Periodically stops moving and continuously provides Energy to all enemies within attack range.
[Overload] Greatly increases ASPD, DEF, and RES for a longer period of time.

enemy_1357_erob.name: Paramilitary Axeman
enemy_1357_erob.description: An outlaw hired to sow chaos, equipped with a thermal energy axe that consumes too much power. The energy supply isn't quite sufficient to start it up.

abilityList.text: Energy Capacity: 20; Gains [Overload] upon reaching max Energy.
Continuously drains 1 Energy from all nearby ground enemies.
[Overload] Greatly increases ASPD, DEF, and RES for a longer period of time.

enemy_1357_erob_2.name: Paramilitary Axeman Leader
enemy_1357_erob_2.description: An outlaw hired to sow chaos, equipped with a thermal energy axe that consumes too much power. They will find a way to use their associates' energy supplies.

abilityList.text: Energy Capacity: 20; Gains [Overload] upon reaching max Energy.
Continuously drains 1 Energy from all nearby ground enemies.
[Overload] Greatly increases ASPD, DEF, and RES for a longer period of time.

enemy_1358_esheld.name: Paramilitary Defender
enemy_1358_esheld.description: A mercenary hired to sow chaos, equipped with a heavy protective suit that is charged in advance to preempt any energy leakage issues. Due to their relatively high education level, part of the job description is to provide handwritten thermal energy amplifier reports to their employer.

abilityList.text: Energy Capacity: 20; Gains [Overload] upon reaching max Energy.
Starts with an additional 15 Energy, but loses 1 Energy per 10 seconds.
[Overload] Greatly increases ASPD, DEF, and RES for a longer period of time.

enemy_1358_esheld_2.name: Paramilitary Defender Leader
enemy_1358_esheld_2.description: A mercenary hired to sow chaos, equipped with a heavy protective suit that is charged in advance to preempt any energy leakage issues. In addition to causing damage, they are also responsible for compiling and submitting the team's test results.

abilityList.text: Energy Capacity: 20; Gains [Overload] upon reaching max Energy.
Starts with an additional 15 Energy, but loses 1 Energy per 10 seconds.
[Overload] Greatly increases ASPD, DEF, and RES for a longer period of time.

enemy_1359_ekulsr.name: Paramilitary Bombardier
enemy_1359_ekulsr.description: A mercenary hired to sow chaos, equipped with a compressed-air grenade launcher. In complete disregard to safety regulations, the gas cylinder is pre-heated to increase weapon efficiency.

abilityList.text: Energy Capacity: 30; Gains [Overload] upon reaching max Energy.
Starts with an additional 25 Energy, but loses 1 Energy per 5 seconds.
While not blocked, launches grenades that deal damage to the target and surrounding units.
[Overload] Greatly increases ASPD, DEF, and RES for a longer period of time.

enemy_1359_ekulsr_2.name: Paramilitary Bombardier Leader
enemy_1359_ekulsr_2.description: A mercenary hired to sow chaos, equipped with a compressed-air grenade launcher. The gas cylinder has been heated to such a degree that their colleagues are afraid to get close.

abilityList.text: Energy Capacity: 30; Gains [Overload] upon reaching max Energy.
Starts with an additional 25 Energy, but loses 1 Energy per 5 seconds.
While not blocked, launches grenades that deal damage to the target and surrounding units.
[Overload] Greatly increases ASPD, DEF, and RES for a longer period of time.

enemy_1360_dfello.name: Bloodborn Spawn
enemy_1360_dfello.description: A creation of the Sanguine Court's Originium Arts. It is said that just a few drops of fresh blood can spawn an entire swarm of these mindless worms. Once they've latched on, they will never let go until their hunger and thirst have been sated.

abilityList.text: Deals Arts damage and gains increased ATK depending on the number of units the target is blocking.
Attacks restore HP proportional to damage dealt
Leaves behind <Blood Amber> when defeated.

enemy_1361_dthrow.name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Bombardier
enemy_1361_dthrow.description: A long-range bombardier of the Sarkaz Royal Court that has received the blessing of the Sanguinarch of Vampires. Wherever they aim will be left a sea of flames, and their targets inevitably reduced to rubble.

abilityList.text: Deals long-ranged attacks that explode after a delay, inflicting Physical damage in an area.
Will be reborn as a <Touch of the Sanguinarch> after falling in battle for the first time

enemy_1361_dthrow_2.name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Annihilator
enemy_1361_dthrow_2.description: An elite long-range bombardier of the Sarkaz Royal Court that has received the blessing of the Sanguinarch of Vampires. They do not aim at any particular target or tangible enemy. The only thing reflected in their eyes is ruination itself.

abilityList.text: Deals long-ranged attacks that explode after a delay, inflicting Physical damage in an area.
Will be reborn as a <Touch of Benevolence> after falling in battle for the first time

enemy_1362_dfat.name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Punisher
enemy_1362_dfat.description: A formation-breaker of the Sarkaz Royal Court that has received the blessing of the Sanguinarch of Vampires. Said to have violated the taboos of the Court, however the Sanguinarch did not punish them for their transgressions. Instead, they now inflict upon others the pain that should have befallen them.

abilityList.text: After several attacks, <$ba.stun>Stuns</> friendly units in an area.
Will be reborn as a <Gift of the Sanguinarch> after falling in battle for the first time

enemy_1362_dfat_2.name: Sarkaz Heirbearer Scourger
enemy_1362_dfat_2.description: An elite formation-breaker of the Sarkaz Royal Court that has received the blessing of the Sanguinarch of Vampires. Said to have disobeyed the Sanguinarch's will, however the Sanguinarch did not punish them for their transgressions. In return, these warriors convert their regret into endless slaughter and wash away their guilt with blood.

abilityList.text: After several attacks, <$ba.stun>Stuns</> friendly units in an area.
Will be reborn as a <Gift of Magnanimity> after falling in battle for the first time

enemy_1363_spnshd.name: Sarkaz Boneguard
enemy_1363_spnshd.description: A guard responsible for protecting the Feranmut's skeleton. As some of the most loyal adherents of the Military Commission, they will carry out their duties at any cost, even if they must shed their own blood.

abilityList.text: More likely to be attacked by friendly units.
Upon receiving damage, reduces the ASPD of the attacker.
Prevents <Anti-Witchcraft Repositionable Bombs> from moving when nearby.
Leaves behind 2 <Blood Amber> when defeated.

enemy_1363_spnshd_2.name: Sarkaz Boneguard Captain
enemy_1363_spnshd_2.description: A guard captain responsible for protecting the Feranmut's skeleton. As some of the most fervent adherents of the Military Commission, they will realize the Commission's will at any cost, even if they must shed their own blood.

abilityList.text: More likely to be attacked by friendly units.
Upon receiving damage, reduces the ASPD of the attacker.
Prevents <Anti-Witchcraft Repositionable Bombs> from moving when nearby.
Leaves behind 2 <Blood Amber> when defeated.

enemy_1364_spnaxe.name: Sarkaz Boneguard Flayer
enemy_1364_spnaxe.description: A professional armsmaster responsible for protecting the Feranmut's skeleton, carefully selected by the Military Commission. They use witchcraft to connect themselves with the Feranmut's nerves, allowing the entire skeleton to become their weapon.

abilityList.text: Recovers a portion of HP and gains increased ATK when either enemy or friendly units are defeated within range (can stack).
Leaves behind 2 <Blood Amber> when defeated.

enemy_1364_spnaxe_2.name: Sarkaz Boneguard Torturer
enemy_1364_spnaxe_2.description: An elite armsmaster responsible for protecting the Feranmut's skeleton, carefully selected by the most senior members of the Military Commission. The degree of their fusion with the Feranmut's nerves defies common understanding, with their ancient witchcraft drilled deep into their bodies.

abilityList.text: Recovers a portion of HP and gains increased ATK when either enemy or friendly units are defeated within range (can stack).
Leaves behind 2 <Blood Amber> when defeated.

enemy_1365_spnwiz.name: Sarkaz Boneguard Fluxcaster
enemy_1365_spnwiz.description: A Sarkaz Caster responsible for guarding the Feranmut's skeleton, their nature warped due to perpetually drifting through spacetime along with it. In times of emergency, they will call upon the Feranmut's power to disappear from the enemy's sight before reappearing at a more opportune time.

abilityList.text: If defeated within range of a Bloodcalling Altar, slips into a turbulence in spacetime and cannot be attacked during this period.
Will revive on the field when affected by an altar's pulse.

enemy_1365_spnwiz_2.name: Sarkaz Boneguard Fluxcaster Captain
enemy_1365_spnwiz_2.description: A Sarkaz Caster responsible for guarding the Feranmut's skeleton, their nature warped due to perpetually drifting through spacetime along with it, to the point that their very existence has become tenuous. In times of emergency, they will call upon the Feranmut's power to hide within the turbulent folds of spacetime before reappearing at a more opportune time to deliver a fatal blow.

abilityList.text: If defeated within range of a Bloodcalling Altar, slips into a turbulence in spacetime and cannot be attacked during this period.
Will revive on the field when affected by an altar's pulse.

enemy_1366_dcolle.name: Sarkaz Bloodwalker
enemy_1366_dcolle.description: A special entity within the Crimson Court, ensuring that no touch of the Crimson's dominion over blood goes to waste. They collect the essence condensed from the blood spilled on the battlefield and wait for it to be given form again through the ancient rituals of the vampires.

abilityList.text: Cannot be blocked.
Collects up to 5 pieces of dropped <Blood Amber>. When defeated, drops all collected <Blood Amber>.

enemy_1366_dcolle_2.name: Sarkaz Bloodnexus
enemy_1366_dcolle_2.description: A very special entity within the Crimson Court, ensuring that each strand of blood weaves the decrees issued by the Regent of the Royal Court. They collect the essence condensed from the blood spilled on the battlefield and wait for it to be returned to the cycle of slaughter through the ancient rituals of the vampires.

abilityList.text: Cannot be blocked.
Collects up to 5 pieces of dropped <Blood Amber>. When defeated, drops all collected <Blood Amber>.

enemy_1367_dseed.name: Blood Amber
enemy_1367_dseed.description: The blood that flows from warriors under the gaze of the Sanguinarch of Vampires will be turned into beautiful crystals waiting to be used once more, waiting to savor the taste of despair once more.

abilityList.text: When affected by the pulse of a Bloodcalling Altar, will be reborn as a Bloodborn Spawn at the altar.

enemy_1368_spilot.name: Commander Ulšulah
enemy_1368_spilot.description: Ulšulah, Lifebone's commander and the youngest major in the Kazdel Military Commission, fights not for any specific person or organization, but rather for the possibility that Kazdel can one day become a true country.

abilityList.text: [Marrowchill Aura] Significantly reduces the ASPD of surrounding allied units and gives a Bloodcalling Altar the ability to produce Blood Amber.
When defeated, returns to a Bloodcalling Altar and revives after a period of time.

enemy_1369_bmbcar1.name: Anti-Witchcraft Repositionable Bomb
enemy_1369_bmbcar1.description: A bomb whose explosion can suppress the effects of Sarkaz witchcraft, with a prototype delivery platform originating from Victoria. After being modified by a certain demolition expert, it has become a trump card in our desperate battles.

abilityList.text: Neutral unit; will be prioritized by both enemy and friendly units.
Movement Speed is slowed when attacked by an enemy unit, but increased when attacked by a friendly unit.
Explodes upon reaching a Bloodcalling Altar, dealing a large amount of True damage to surrounding enemies and destroying the Altar.

enemy_1371_ltnflu.name: Remnant Orchestra Flautist
enemy_1371_ltnflu.description: Flautist who wants to join their king's orchestra. This nobody has never seen the spectacle, and is all the more fanatical for it.

abilityList.text: After 2 attacks, the next attack has increased ATK

enemy_1371_ltnflu_2.name: Witch King's Orchestra Flautist
enemy_1371_ltnflu_2.description: Flautist who once played in their king's orchestra. This nobody has unfortunately seen the spectacle, and is all the more fanatical for it.

abilityList.text: After 2 attacks, the next attack has increased ATK

enemy_1372_ltntpt.name: Remnant Orchestra Trumpeter
enemy_1372_ltntpt.description: Trumpeter who wants to sound their king's triumph. His music is sharp and bright, and he believes himself to be the herald of victory.

abilityList.text: After 2 attacks, the next attack deals splash damage in a cross
Attacks deal Arts damage when passionate variation is active

enemy_1372_ltntpt_2.name: Witch King's Orchestra Trumpeter
enemy_1372_ltntpt_2.description: Trumpeter who once sounded their king's triumph. His music is sharper and brighter, and he has heralded many victories.

abilityList.text: After 2 attacks, the next attack deals splash damage in a cross
Attacks deal Arts damage when passionate variation is active

enemy_1373_ltnhor.name: Remnant Orchestra Hornist
enemy_1373_ltnhor.description: Hornist who wants to display his skills under their king. He has never had a chance to show off his talents, and waits for an opportunity to awe the world.

abilityList.text: After 2 attacks, the next attack hits an additional target
Attacks deal Arts damage when passionate variation is active

enemy_1373_ltnhor_2.name: Witch King's Orchestra Hornist
enemy_1373_ltnhor_2.description: Hornist who once displayed his skills under their king. He never truly had a chance to show off his talents, and waits for more opportunities to awe the world.

abilityList.text: After 2 attacks, the next attack hits an additional target
Attacks deal Arts damage when passionate variation is active

enemy_1374_ltnhap.name: Remnant Orchestra Chorister
enemy_1374_ltnhap.description: Chorister who wants to sing their king's praise. He tries to write his ode, but every word he pens is as malevolent as any curse.

abilityList.text: After 1 attack, the next attack restores HP based on ATK
Instead restores the HP of this unit and all enemies within attack range when passionate variation is active

enemy_1374_ltnhap_2.name: Witch King's Orchestra Chorister
enemy_1374_ltnhap_2.description: Chorister who once sang their king's praise. He has written many odes, but every word he pens is more malevolent than any curse.

abilityList.text: After 1 attack, the next attack restores HP based on ATK
Instead restores the HP of this unit and all enemies within attack range when passionate variation is active

enemy_1375_ltnclr.name: Remnant Orchestra Wind Player
enemy_1375_ltnclr.description: Wind player who wants to become the concertmaster of their king's orchestra. He worked hard to climb the ladder, but the orchestra is long gone, for which he is very resentful.

abilityList.text: ATK continuously increases when unblocked. ATK is reset after the next attack.
When melancholic variation is active, ATK is greatly increased, and attacks <$ba.stun>Stun</> the target

enemy_1375_ltnclr_2.name: Witch King's Orchestra Wind Player
enemy_1375_ltnclr_2.description: Wind player who was once the concertmaster of their king's orchestra. He was once atop the ladder, but the orchestra is long gone, for which he is beyond resentful.

abilityList.text: ATK continuously increases when unblocked. ATK is reset after the next attack.
When melancholic variation is active, ATK is greatly increased, and attacks <$ba.stun>Stun</> the target

enemy_1376_ltndru.name: Remnant Orchestra Drummer
enemy_1376_ltndru.description: Drummer who wants to set the beat for their king's music. Every beat he drums is filled with pain, for he punishes himself to achieve steady rhythm.

abilityList.text: After 2 attacks, the next attack deals splash damage to all targets in attack range
Attack range increases when passionate variation is active

enemy_1376_ltndru_2.name: Witch King's Orchestra Drummer
enemy_1376_ltndru_2.description: Drummer who once set the beat for their king's music. Every beat he drums is filled with suffering, for he torments himself to achieve impeccable rhythm.

abilityList.text: After 2 attacks, the next attack deals splash damage to all targets in attack range
Attack range increases when passionate variation is active

enemy_1377_ltnclo.name: Remnant Orchestra Cellist
enemy_1377_ltnclo.description: Cellist who wants to be their king's trusted henchman. He lives to earn their king's favor, for which he is willing to play obsequious tunes.

abilityList.text: More likely to be attacked by your units

When melancholic variation is active, ATK is greatly increased, and gains a Shield that protects against a certain number of attacks; each time damage is prevented, reflects as Physical damage based on own ATK

enemy_1377_ltnclo_2.name: Witch King's Orchestra Cellist
enemy_1377_ltnclo_2.description: Cellist who was once their king's trusted henchman. He lives to keep their king's favor, for which he is willing to play loathed tunes.

abilityList.text: More likely to be attacked by your units

When melancholic variation is active, ATK is greatly increased, and gains a Shield that protects against a certain number of attacks; each time damage is prevented, reflects as Physical damage based on own ATK

enemy_1378_ltnmst.name: Remnant Orchestra Tuner
enemy_1378_ltnmst.description: Musician who wants to tune for their king. He seeks the harmony of origin, so that all sounds may be consonant.

abilityList.text: Continuously casts at the nearest Tuning Node you control within attack range to disable it
When the corresponding variation is in effect, attacks temporarily increase damage taken by your units

enemy_1378_ltnmst_2.name: Witch King's Orchestra Tuner
enemy_1378_ltnmst_2.description: Musician who once tuned for their king. He has touched the harmony of origin, and in his hands all sounds may be consonant.

abilityList.text: Continuously casts at the nearest Tuning Node you control within attack range to disable it
When the corresponding variation is in effect, attacks temporarily increase damage taken by your units

enemy_1379_ltncdt.name: Remnant Orchestra Conductor
enemy_1379_ltncdt.description: Conductor who wants to be the instrument of their king's will. Being a conductor is already a rare honor, but he still seeks to climb that great spire, for which he will go to any length.

abilityList.text: Continuously casts at the nearest Tuning Node you control within attack range to disable it
When the corresponding variation is in effect, increases the max HP of all enemies within attack range

enemy_1379_ltncdt_2.name: Witch King's Orchestra Conductor
enemy_1379_ltncdt_2.description: Conductor who was once the instrument of their king's will. Having been second only to one, and having gazed upon that elusive spire, he will go to any length to see it again.

abilityList.text: Continuously casts at the nearest Tuning Node you control within attack range to disable it
When the corresponding variation is in effect, greatly increases the max HP of all enemies within attack range

enemy_2001_duckmi.name: Duck Lord
enemy_2001_duckmi.description: A famous Columbian investor, entrepreneur, and master of 'Duck Power.' Out of the public eye, enjoys kicking back with others...

abilityList.text: Cannot be blocked.
Gains significantly increased Movement Speed after being attacked

enemy_2002_bearmi.name: Gopnik
enemy_2002_bearmi.description: The Ursus security guard hired by Duck Lord. Powerful, but not very smart. Mainly responsible for carrying luggage for Duck Lord.

enemy_2034_sythef.name: Crying Thief
enemy_2034_sythef.description: A Perro who left his family to seek out a new life... but all that people know is that he is always weeping.

abilityList.text: <$ba.invisible>Invisible</>
Attacks <$ba.stun>Stun</> the target

enemy_2009_csaudc.name: Derisive Audience
enemy_2009_csaudc.description: A diehard fan of the Crimson Troupe, they enjoy the performances night and day. They have become as incomprehensible as the troupe itself.

abilityList.text: Attacks inflict additional <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</>

enemy_2010_csdcr.name: Scarlet Singer
enemy_2010_csdcr.description: A performer of the Crimson Troupe, they unleash their singing voices when sufficiently stimulated, inciting their followers to attack in a frenzy.

abilityList.text: Attacks inflict additional <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</>
After receiving a certain number of hits, greatly increases all enemies' ASPD for a short period

enemy_2011_csppt.name: Theater Golem
enemy_2011_csppt.description: A gigantic golem maintained by the Crimson Troupe's prop department, they are normally used to move bulky items. They are massive and difficult to block.

abilityList.text: Can only be blocked by units with at least 4 Block
Attacks deal Splash damage to allied units in a small area around self

enemy_2012_csbln.name: 'Small Surprise'
enemy_2012_csbln.description: A special gift prepared by the Crimson Troupe for the audience. Every audience member who receives a gift will become particularly 'ecstatic'.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.
Upon death, deals Arts damage to all surrounding units and inflicts <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</>

enemy_2017_csphts.name: Ominous Apparition
enemy_2017_csphts.description: A patch of shadow. It has never once left, nor has it ever truly existed.

abilityList.text: Has a chance to dodge Physical and Arts attacks when not blocked
Can use a skill to deal Physical damage in the surrounding area
Attacks and skills ignore a certain amount of armor and inflict additional <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</>

enemy_2021_syfish.name: Bone Sea Drifter
enemy_2021_syfish.description: Sea Terrors travel in large swarms, seeking carcasses to feast on and becoming food for other Sea Terrors themselves.

abilityList.text: Attacks inflict additional <$ba.dt.erosion>Corrosion Damage</>.

enemy_2022_syzeni.name: Ocean Stonecutter
enemy_2022_syzeni.description: Sea Terror with a hard shell, protecting the swarm from enemies.

abilityList.text: When your units enter its attack range for the first time, temporarily stops moving and gains increased DEF.

enemy_2023_sypult.name: Retching Broodmother
enemy_2023_sypult.description: Sea Terror mothers that throw fake offspring at oncoming threats, allowing the true offspring to flee.

abilityList.text: Can only attack ground targets
Summons 1 <Baleful Broodling> near the target when dealing damage

enemy_2024_synut.name: Baleful Broodling
enemy_2024_synut.description: An extension of the broodmother's body, identical to newly-born offspring.

abilityList.text: Unable to move
Gradually loses HP over time
Attacks inflict additional <$ba.dt.erosion>Corrosion Damage</>.

enemy_2025_syufo.name: Skimming Sea Drifter
enemy_2025_syufo.description: Some Sea Terrors have begun to adapt to the sky, able to glide above the waves for extended periods. Perhaps this branch will eventually evolve to make their home in the heavens.

abilityList.text: <$ba.float>Low-Altitude Hovering</>
Attacks inflict additional <$ba.dt.erosion>Corrosion Damage</>.

enemy_2033_syboys.name: Pathshaper Fractal
enemy_2033_syboys.description: Fractals left behind by the Seaborn Pathshaper. Illusions must eventually vanish. The path is not clear. Search on, search on.

abilityList.text: Dies after some time
Every 3rd attack summons a <Pathshaper Fractal>

enemy_2040_syrott.name: Ishar'mla's Tears
enemy_2040_syrott.description: Manifestation of Ishar'mla's explorative and combative nature.

abilityList.text: Appears around your units
Periodically deals True damage. If there are no targets within attack range, charges up <Ishar'mla, Heart of Corruption>
Disappears when <Ishar'mla, Heart of Corruption> transforms

enemy_2041_syjely.name: Izumik's Offspring
enemy_2041_syjely.description: One of Izumik's evolutionary branches, bringing genetic data collected across Terra back to the mother.

abilityList.text: Becomes a random enemy when blocked.

enemy_2035_sybox.name: Chest Seaborn
enemy_2035_sybox.description: Sea Terror disguised as a treasure chest, often used by Bishops of the Deep to protect hideouts.

enemy_2043_smsbr.name: Tainted Carcass
enemy_2043_smsbr.description: A Sami warrior irreversibly corrupted by demons. He once went to the snow fields with a clear purpose, but is now completely bereft.

abilityList.text: Movement Speed significantly increases for a short time after taking damage

enemy_2044_smwiz.name: Distorted Caster
enemy_2044_smwiz.description: A Sami shaman possessed by demons. Everything they understood about nature has been reconstructed into pure nothingness.

abilityList.text: Movement Speed significantly increases after not attacking for a period of time, resets on attack

enemy_2045_smdrn.name: Collapsed Construct
enemy_2045_smdrn.description: A drone corrupted by demonic power, now acting like a real lifeform.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.

enemy_2046_smwar.name: Shattered Champion
enemy_2046_smwar.description: Once an honorable warrior of the Treescar tribe, now a part of the demons' vanguard, together with their fallen chief.

enemy_2059_smbox.name: Testaceous Vinecreeps
enemy_2059_smbox.description: A seed falls into a box abandoned in the wild, and soon becomes a hunter preying on curiosity.

enemy_4001_toxcar.name: Retrofitted Gastruck
enemy_4001_toxcar.description: A pesticide spraying vehicle that used to belong to a large nomadic city. It has been retrofitted by Closure to spray tear gas instead, but she didn't have time to install an IFF system.

abilityList.text: When unblocked, all allied units lose HP constantly

enemy_4001_toxcar_2.name: Supercharged Gastruck
enemy_4001_toxcar_2.description: A pesticide spraying vehicle that used to belong to a large nomadic city. It has been retrofitted by Closure to spray tear gas instead, but she didn't have time to install an IFF system. This model has an expanded gas tank and is far more dangerous.

abilityList.text: When unblocked, all allied units lose HP constantly

enemy_4002_syokai.name: Cheap Second-hand Drone
enemy_4002_syokai.description: Cheap goods sold for scrap from the Kazimierz arenas. Feel free to waste it however you like.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.
When destroyed, grants a deployable unit
Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter

enemy_4002_syokai_2.name: Remodeled Second-hand Drone
enemy_4002_syokai_2.description: Cheap goods sold for scrap from the Kazimierz arenas. Closure has performed some slight modifications on this batch, but it won't change the fact these are cheap as hell.

abilityList.text: Flying unit.
When destroyed, grants a deployable unit
Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter

enemy_4003_pbank.name: Mobile Power Source
enemy_4003_pbank.description: An experimental prototype developed during the early years of a certain Columbian tech company. The objective was to provide power on the battlefield, however due to the lack of a positioning device, it will often leave by itself if unattended to.

abilityList.text: Cannot be blocked.
When destroyed, recovers the SP of nearby Operators
Does not count towards the defeated enemies counter

enemy_1050_lslime.name: 'Pompeii'
enemy_1050_lslime.description: A massive infected beast. These aberrations were born in a special high-temperature environment. Nobody wants to approach these creatures due to their grotesque appearance and the extreme heat they give off. The existence of these giant creatures has been known since ancient times, but to see one warped by infection is terrifyingly unforgettable...

abilityList.text: Can attack up to 4 targets at once and ignites targets it attacks, dealing Burn damage over time
Self-immolates when blocked, dealing heavy damage
Gains significantly increased ASPD when HP drops to half

enemy_1500_skulsr.name: Skullshatterer
enemy_1500_skulsr.description: One of Reunion's squad leaders who serves in the Assault Squad. Though armed with an Originium launcher and explosives, reports show that he possesses high mobility and poses a significant threat even in melee combat.He has been seen several times around Lungmen, and intel suggests that he is carrying out some special operation in the region.

abilityList.text: Launches grenades when not being blocked, significantly reducing the DEF of the target and surrounding allies for a short period of time
Gains significantly increased ATK when HP is under 50%

enemy_1502_crowns.name: Crownslayer
enemy_1502_crowns.description: One of Reunion's squad leaders who handles infiltration and assassination operations, specializing in melee combat and breaking through defensive lines. Her stealth and superb infiltration abilities have foiled countless attempts to capture her.

abilityList.text: When blocked, can quickly move behind the unit

enemy_1503_talula.name: Talulah
enemy_1503_talula.description: The leader and spokesperson of Reunion. So far, she has been confirmed to have masterminded multiple riots, as well as the destruction of Chernobog.

abilityList.text: [Stellar Corona] Deals Arts damage to all allied units within range
[Burning Breath] Causes an allied unit within attack range to take True damage that gradually increases (Deals increasing True damage each second, but can be <$ba.buffres>Resisted</>)
Deals True damage when blocked
When HP drops below half, gains greatly increased DEF and RES and uses skills more often

enemy_1504_cqbw.name: W
enemy_1504_cqbw.description: A Sarkaz Mercenary and one of Reunion's squad leaders, she carries around a weapon that resembles a Laterano Gun. However, she almost exclusively attacks using explosives and throwing weapons. One of her common strategies is to attack the enemy's flank using large amounts of active Originium explosives. However, her erratic movements make her almost impossible to predict...

abilityList.text: Can use explosives to deal heavy Physical damage to allied units
Uses more explosives when HP is under 50%

enemy_1505_frstar.name: FrostNova
enemy_1505_frstar.description: A Caster who is one of Reunion's squad leaders. She is one of the few Casters capable of suppressing enemies in a head-on engagement. Among the squads she leads, the special 'Yeti Squadron' assists her in some special operations. As her name implies, she has a cold personality.

abilityList.text: Frequently attacks allied units within range with Ice Nova, dealing heavy Arts damage and reducing the ASPD of affected units for a few seconds
Can Freeze the ground with Arts, rendering them unable to be deployed upon
Revives after dying for the first time, gaining increased ATK

enemy_1507_mephi.name: Mephisto
enemy_1507_mephi.description: A Medic who is one of Reunion's squad leaders, often working in tandem with Faust. He heals the wounded while commanding his troops to attack, and can improve their life recovery rate. He boasts a high resistance to Arts. Currently, it has been confirmed that he is the one controlling the Hosts.

abilityList.text: Doubles the HP regeneration of all enemies on the field
Regular attacks heal 3 enemies simultaneously

enemy_1508_faust.name: Faust
enemy_1508_faust.description: A Sniper who is one of Reunion's squad leaders, often working in tandem with Mephisto. He uses extremely long-range attacks to inflict devastating physical damage. He is known to occasionally use special attacks such as summoning turret-like ballistae or launching highly destructive bolts.

abilityList.text: Cannot be blocked and is initially Invulnerable for a period of time
Can attack with a special bolt dealing double damage
Periodically summons a hidden turret on the battlefield

enemy_1509_mousek.name: 'Rat King'
enemy_1509_mousek.description: Lin, Lin Gray, the Rat King of the slum. He bears many titles, just like the shifting of the city's shadows underneath his feet. Don't touch the red lines. If you ever have a moment of indecisiveness, whatever it is that you were concerned about will become nothing more than a whisper in the winds above the dunes.

abilityList.text: [Singing Sands] Targets a unit with the highest Max HP, dealing heavy physical damage to the target and nearby allied units within a cross area
[Sand Tomb] Targets a unit with the lowest Max HP, continuously inflicting Arts damage to the target and nearby allies, also reducing their ATK
Appears with a Barrier that can absorb a large amount of Arts damage, gains significantly increased DEF while Barrier is active
Deals more damage when HP drops below half

enemy_1510_frstar2.name: FrostNova, 'Winter's Scar'
enemy_1510_frstar2.description: Leader of the Yeti Squadron, she has released the remainder of what little life force she has left in preparation for the final battle. The biting cold of the land has already been released; are we truly prepared to make an enemy out of it?

abilityList.text: Normal attacks and Ice Nova deal Arts damage and applies <$ba.cold>Cold</> to targets
Ice Nova deals double damage to <$ba.frozen>Frozen</> targets
Initially Invulnerable for a period of time during the second form, attacks and skills become stronger

enemy_1506_patrt.name: Patriot
enemy_1506_patrt.description: His armor is in disrepair and damaged in many places. The blade of his once sharp halberd is now eroded with rust. However, the indomitable Patriot never capitulates, never backs down, and never shows mercy. He has long struggled with fate, and now resolves to slit the throat of fate.

abilityList.text: Greatly increases the ATK and DEF of enemy units
Marching Stance
Gains greatly increased ATK, DEF, and RES. Becomes more likely to be targeted by your units, and normal attacks strike 4 times
Enters a revival state when HP drops to 0, continuously dealing True damage to units around him. After a period of time, enters Ruination stance
Ruination Stance
Can perform long-ranged attacks
Deals Physical damage to the farthest high ground unit
Continuously deals True damage to allied units within range
Immune to Stun, Frozen, and Levitate

enemy_1511_mdrock.name: Mudrock
enemy_1511_mdrock.description: Age unknown, gender unknown, history unknown. This ex-Reunion member now leads an organization of Infected and wanders the wilderness between the cities of Leithanien. What thoughts run through Mudrock's mind as being forced to once again step upon the battlefield?

abilityList.text: Every attack permanently increases ATK, stacking up to 6 times
Has a shield that absorbs Arts damage; while the shield persists, this unit has greatly increased Max HP and ASPD
Barrier periodically refreshes
Can use a skill to automatically seize control of the nearest non-enemy controlled 'Gramophone'

enemy_1512_mcmstr.name: 'The Big Ugly Thing'
enemy_1512_mcmstr.description: Zumama's magnum opus, a massive mechanical monster piloted by the High Priest. It can strike both in melee range and from a distance, capable of easily destroying Giant Mushrooms and Stumps. Normal engineers cannot even fathom how a machine slapped together haphazardly like this can even move, but move it indeed does.

abilityList.text: First Form
Ranged attacks deal Splash damage, Melee attacks deal more damage
Periodically destroys Giant Mushrooms and Stumps, rendering them unable to be deployed upon
When HP drops to 0, it will explode, <$ba.stun>Stunning</> units in a large area and ejecting its pilot, the High Priest
High Priest Form
Will not attack, cannot be blocked, and takes True damage every second

enemy_1513_dekght.name: Corrupted Knight
enemy_1513_dekght.description: A Sarkaz knight with a broken horn who radiates terror and shows clear signs of excessive drug use. Uses a warhammer in battle. Crushes enemies with terrifying bloodlust. When the Withered Knight falls, takes up the quest and becomes dramatically stronger. Every step he takes spreads corruption.

abilityList.text: Attacks deal Physical damage to the target and adjacent allied units
Does charged attacks, dealing heavy Physical damage to the targets and any adjacent units
Gains greatly increased ATK, ASPD, and Movement Speed when <Withered Knight> dies

enemy_1513_dekght_2.name: Withered Knight
enemy_1513_dekght_2.description: A Sarkaz knight with a broken horn who radiates terror and shows clear signs of excessive drug use. Uses a cursed bow in battle. Can shoot multiple targets at once and plant seeds of withering arts. When the Corrupted Knight falls, takes up the quest and becomes dramatically stronger. Knights that are hostile to him will shift to Wither.

abilityList.text: Attacks 2 targets simultaneously
Fires explosive arrows at three targets which explode after a short delay, dealing high Arts damage to the target and surrounding four tiles
Gains greatly increased ATK, ASPD, and Movement Speed when <Corrupted Knight> dies

enemy_1514_smephi.name: Mephisto, 'The Singer'
enemy_1514_smephi.description: You seem to recognize the mysterious, mythical beast that has descended from the Sarcophagus. An otherworldly song flows from its sharp beak and floods its surroundings. It seems to devour the will of the Infected around it, including its own. Even if it knows not what it is doing, its song does not cease. It simply wishes to sing.

abilityList.text: Activated Form
When Activated, heals and strengthens an enemy Host unit
Each time a certain percentage of HP is lost, releases toxic dust across the entire battlefield that lasts for 30s and can stack
The first time HP drops to 0, enters a Dormant State for a period of time
Dormant State
Gains increased DEF and RES, and continuously recovers HP

enemy_1515_bsnake.name: 'Deathless Black Snake'
enemy_1515_bsnake.description: A disenchanted Reunion soldier, or a giant manipulating history? A conspirator full of lies, or a nobleman swallowed by tragedy? The truth has been turned to ash, and only an evil god stands in the flames.

abilityList.text: First Phase
Attacks deal True damage and apply [Burning Breath] to the target (Deals increasing True damage each second, but can be <$ba.buffres>Resisted</>)
Periodically applies [Burning Breath] to two allied units, and also greatly reduces damage taken from units afflicted with [Burning Breath]
Detonates all allied units on the field afflicted by [Burning Breath], dealing Arts damage to the surrounding four tiles and applying [Burning Breath] to targets hit by this splash effect
When HP drops to 0, releases [Deathless Inferno], dealing massive Arts damage across the battlefield and enters Enraged State
Enraged State
Max HP and ATK are greatly increased
Summons an <Energy Aggregate> to help in combat

enemy_1516_jakill.name: Jesselton Williams
enemy_1516_jakill.description: Jesselton Williams, a killer who infiltrated the prison disguised as a jailer. Very particular in both speech and action, he remains graceful even in the midst of battle.

abilityList.text: Jailer Form
RES is greatly increased
Attacks become ranged and deal Arts damage, and no longer attacks Imprisonment Devices
Can <$ba.stun>Stun</> multiple targets
The first time HP drops to 0, enters Killer Form
Killer Form
Frees all imprisoned enemies when entering Killer Form
Gains significantly increased DEF
Uses melee Physical attacks that ignore a certain amount of the target's DEF

enemy_1517_xi.name: 'Free'
enemy_1517_xi.description: A monster drawn by Dusk. It has a commanding presence and chilling arrogance, as though taking a page out of its master's book. 'The virid beasts. Like range on range. Eleven told. In moon, smoke-flow.'

abilityList.text: First Form
[Weft and Warp] Deals Arts damage to targets in the surrounding cross area, changing Hui-Ming attributes within its range
[Break the Chains] Deals massive damage in a large radius if the shield is not destroyed before it expires
The first time HP drops to 0, enters Second Form
Second Form
Changes own Hui-Ming Attribute
Gains increased ATK and normal attacks hit twice
Additionally unleashes [Weft and Warp] on farthest target

enemy_1519_bgball.name: 'Essence of Evolution'
enemy_1519_bgball.description: A madman who should not have stepped upon this world. An oddity that should not have existed in the other world. The union of the two gave birth to this node of 'evolution' that far surpasses the limits of biology. It's existence naturally contradicts all of Terra. It should not live. It must not live.

abilityList.text: Unable to move
Will evolve after a certain duration or when HP falls below a certain threshold
Periodically creates <Originiutant Excrescences> or <Originiutant Tumors>
Periodically deals a large amount of True damage to all allied units on the field
Firstborn Form
Greatly reduces Physical and Arts damage taken from units to the left
Evolution Form
Greatly reduces Physical and Arts damage taken from units to the right
Perfect Form
Takes greatly reduced Physical and Arts damage, but loses HP every second

enemy_1520_empgrd.name: 'Emperor's Blade', Pursuer
enemy_1520_empgrd.description: He once ravaged the demons of the Northern Tundra, segregating the outsiders beyond the reach of civilization; His blade shies not from royals nor nobles, safeguarding glory from the dusts of rebellion. Every Royal Guard is as a dominion; the land beneath their feet is all the territory of Ursus.

abilityList.text: First Form

Whenever a certain percentage of HP is lost, unleashes the permanent terrain effect [Dominion], significantly reducing allied units' ASPD and reducing Physical and Arts damage taken by self when within its effect (Prioritizes targeting the ally unit outside of [Dominion] that has dealt the most damage to this unit)
[Collapsing Fear] Deals Arts damage to nearby units, instantly defeating targets within [Dominion]
The first time HP drops to 0, casts [Collapsing Fear] on the entire battlefield and enters Second Form
Second Form
Gains increased ATK and a melee attack that deals more damage
Whenever a low percentage of HP is lost, unleashes the permanent terrain effect [Dominion]

enemy_1521_dslily.name: Sal Viento Bishop Quintus
enemy_1521_dslily.description: A member of the Church of the Deep who snuck into disaster-ravaged Iberia. He changed the law of the land through his sincere beliefs, in pursuit of the perfect form, yet he was unable to fathom the will of the ocean. Then again, who could?

abilityList.text: Attacks two units with the highest DEF simultaneously
[Great Tide] Deals Arts damage and <$ba.dt.neural>Nervous Impairment</> to all allied units
[Collapse] Deals Physical damage to multiple allied units
[Fragmentation] Summons its offspring to entwine themselves around allied units and <$ba.stun>Stun</> them
[Species Outbreak] Drains all Life Points after a long time has passed in the battle

enemy_1522_captan.name: Pancho Salas
enemy_1522_captan.description: Pancho Salas, an old veteran piloting a heavily modified motorboat. Even should his vessel be destroyed, he will never falter before reaching his goal.

abilityList.text: First Form
Summons <Kites> and <Pancho's Explosive Boats> in battle
Attacks the unit with the highest Max HP with its water cannon, continuously dealing Arts and <$ba.dt.erosion>Corrosion damage</>
The first time HP drops to 0, jumps to a fixed spot and enters Second Form
Second Form
Gains increased ASPD and periodically attacks all surrounding allied units
Attacks the unit with the highest DEF with its small arms, and reduces the target's DEF
When Pancho defeats a unit or is defeated, increases the ASPD and Movement Speed of all enemy units

enemy_1523_mandra.name: Mandragora
enemy_1523_mandra.description: One of the leaders of the Dublinn forces, a caster who controls stone. Emerging from the darkness of Victoria, she has sworn to repay the humiliation she suffered at the hands of the nobles manyfold.

abilityList.text: [Stoneshield] Reduces damage taken; temporarily loses effect after being hit by a Tattered Pillar
First Form
[Mandragora's Gaze] Targets the unit with the highest ATK within range, dealing Arts damage and reducing their ASPD. If the target is retreated or defeated, destroy the tile the unit is on
Second Form
[Stoneshield] Grants <$ba.float>Low-Altitude Hovering</>, and continuously deals Arts damage to units within range
Periodically knocks down Tattered Pillars
Uses [Mandragora's Gaze] more frequently

enemy_1524_bldkgt.name: The Blood Knight Dikaiopolis
enemy_1524_bldkgt.description: The Blood Knight, Dikaiopolis. The originator of Kazimierz's Infected Knight program, the hero of the Grand Knight Territory's Infected, and an idol to countless children. What exactly did the 'hero' give up to obtain the peace we know today?

abilityList.text: Reduce damage taken, but damage reduction does not work on units blocking it
First Form
[Exsanguination] <$ba.stun>Stuns</> the target, dealing Arts damage every second
Resurrection Stance
Blood Knight is invulnerable and continuously summons <Bloodblades>; enters the Second Form after some time
[Resurrection Stance] If the Blood Knight's HP is restored to its maximum while in this stance, he will return to his first form
Second Form
Gains increased ATK and attacks become ranged
Continuously summons <Bloodblades>

enemy_1525_blkswb.name: Degenbrecher
enemy_1525_blkswb.description: Three-time champion of the Kazimierz Major, a defective Leithanian unable to use Arts, a natural-born warrior—The Black Knight.

abilityList.text: Immune to <$ba.frozen>Frozen</> and has <$ba.buffres>Status resistance</>
Gains increased ATK during <Snowfall>
First Form
Attacks against the blocker ignore a certain amount of DEF
[Swift Slayer] When blocked, bypasses the target and deals Physical damage to units along her path
[Brutalizing Blizzard] Deals Physical damage to units in the surrounding area
Second Form
<$ba.invisible>Invisible</>
Attacks ignore more of the target's DEF and strike twice
[Momentum Murder] Whenever 25% HP is lost, clears the SP of all allied units within range and restricts the targets from attacking or healing for some time

enemy_1526_sfsui.name: 'Sui-Xiang'
enemy_1526_sfsui.description: The shadow of the bestial Sui, towering and venerable. It casts its lazy gaze upon the mortal realm, and in the blink of an eye a thousand years have come and gone. With the millennium passing like a dream, it is uncertain whether it is feeling anger or bitterness.

abilityList.text: Reduces damage taken from above and below
Drains all Life Points after a long time has passed in the battle
First Form
[Faraway Mountains' Thunderclap] Deals continuous Arts damage to units within cross areas around three ranged units
When defeated, the unit takes its next form after a period of time, and reappears a certain distance to the right
Second Form
[Heavensfall] Deals Physical damage twice to melee units and additionally inflicts continuous Arts damage that slowly increases over time (can be <$ba.buffres>Resisted</>)
When defeated, the unit takes its next form after a period of time, and reappears a certain distance to the right
Third Form

[Omnidirectional Breath] Inflicts continuous damage to a large area to the right and renders the tiles no longer available for deployment, Operators on the left side of the target area can reduce damage taken by allied units to their right and mitigate damage to the tiles
Can absorb <Wisps> to recover SP

enemy_1527_martyr.name: Andoain, the 'Martyr'
enemy_1527_martyr.description: A Sankta who made an enemy of Laterano for the sake of asking a question. A Pathfinder who tread the path of peril for the sake of receiving an answer. He feels neither wrath nor sorrow. He neither curses God, nor beseeches man. Andoain only follows his own path, wherever it may end.

abilityList.text: Cannot be blocked.
While this unit is holding Ammo, ATK increases. Ammo capacity: 5
While this unit is holding Ammo, gains increased ATK and attacks will cause bullets to bounce to nearby targets up to 5 times, dealing additional damage to 'Gelato Stops'
First Form

[Light Unto Sufferers] Whenever a certain percentage of HP is lost, creates a permanent field effect. Enemies standing on affected tiles take reduced Physical and Arts damage and gain 50% Physical and Arts dodge
Second Form
After being defeated once, enters his Second Form, gaining increased ATK

[Ashes to Ashes, Dust to Dust] Andoain stops attacking and scans the battlefield from left to right, locking onto at most 5 targets before dealing massive Physical damage to them and fully replenishing his Ammo
Whenever a low percentage of HP is lost, unleashes the permanent terrain effect [Light Unto Sufferers]

enemy_1528_manfri.name: Manfred
enemy_1528_manfri.description: A young Sarkaz general, member of the Military Commission of Kazdel. After enlisting a large number of mercenaries in Londinium, he has assembled and trained a brand new type of fighting force. His Arts Unit 'Teekazwurtzen' was bestowed upon him by Theresis, the Regent of Kazdel, who also taught him the swordsmanship he now employs.

abilityList.text: Deals Arts damage with his floating cannon, attacks charge up Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery
[Military Training] Has high Physical and Arts dodge, but after being bombarded by the Defense Artillery, temporarily loses this dodge effect and is stunned for a period of time
First Form
[Focus] Continuously gains ASPD when attacking the same target (this effect is capped), resets when switching targets or not attacking for a few seconds
Second Form

[From Withered Trunk, New Branches] When defeated for the first time, randomly attacks all targets on the battlefield with his floating cannon, greatly accelerating the charge rate of Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery
In his second form, draws his sword alongside his floating cannon to perform simultaneous Physical and Arts attacks

enemy_1529_dsdevr.name: The Endspeaker, Will of We Many
enemy_1529_dsdevr.description: The tiny Seaborn that haunted the mighty Stultifera, the blood of its parents once strewn across the ocean's waters. The revelation reaches not the ears of the children, their kind's destiny quietly continuing to flow.

abilityList.text: When defeated, disappears for a short time before evolving into its next form
When evolving into its next form, gains the following effects in this order: Gains increased DEF/Gains increased Movement Speed/Gains increased ATK and Lifesteal

[Consume] Consumes the [Remains] of its Seaborn kin, gaining their corresponding [Directed Evolution] ability in the next evolutionary phase, while also instantly defeating any Operators near the Remains and preventing them from being redeployed for a period of time.

enemy_1530_white.name: Kreide, 'Worldly Remains'
enemy_1530_white.description: Kreide's form, covered in layers of Originium, calls forth only fear in Leithanien. He stopped the Voice of Mundane from consuming others, yet he himself was consumed in turn. He tried to save everyone present, yet there remains only one way to save him.

abilityList.text: Attacks deals Splash damage, and inflicts <$ba.stun>Stun</> when Blocked
First Form
[Resonance Overload] Causes Realigned Flux to deal continuous damage
[Lamentation of Nothingness] Attacks all targets on the field in order and loses a large amount of HP. When in Realigned Flux, ASPD is reduced
[The Final Rest] Has high DEF and RES, and when defeated for the first time, temporarily changes to an allied unit, and then enters Second Form
Second Form
Loses the increased DEF and RES, and gains increased ATK and skill power instead

enemy_1531_bbrain.name: 'Awaken'
enemy_1531_bbrain.description: The 'Dreamland' that Dorothy personally created. In here, no one will ever have to suffer the pain of the journey. Love and hope shall achieve that which technology cannot.

abilityList.text: Unable to move
When 'Awaken' takes damage, transfers 50% of the damage received to Dorothy's other experiments on the field
First Form

Periodically transfers itself to a specified tile and casts [Shattered Vision], dealing a large amount of physical damage to all units on the field. This damage is split equally among all deployed units
Periodically casts [Journey] to the left and right, dealing Physical damage to the first unit hit
Second Form
Gains increased ATK
Immediately activates all <R-Series Power Armors> on the field
[Shattered Vision] Now also <$ba.stun>Stuns</> units on high ground
'Awaken' will cast [Journey] in all 4 directions

enemy_1532_minima.name: 'Materialist Antagonizer'
enemy_1532_minima.description: Construction machinery attempting to protect Stitch Canvas, under the mistaken impression that he is about to be attacked. Before explaining what's actually going on, let's settle things with a test of strength first.

abilityList.text: Initial Form
Flying unit.
While on the battlefield, increases the strength of all Machine enemies
Attacks will deploy small drones that deal continuous Arts damage to the target for a period of time, prioritizing targets that are not already locked onto by these drones
